english: I'll agree with everything you say.

text: Ancak en azından bunu bize söyleyebilirdin Gündoğdu Bey’im
english: But you could at least tell us, Mr. Gündüz.

text: Dayı oğlu, Alp benim Alp'imdir Vazife de benim vazifemdir
english: Uncle's son, the Alps are my Alps and the mission is my duty.

text: İvedi bir karar vermem icap ederdi, verdim
english: I had to make a quick decision, so I did.

text: Günahı da, sevabı da benim boynuma
english: The sin and the reward are on my neck

text: Ama inşallah Hamza sana bir daha ihanet etmez
english: But I hope Hamza never betrays you again.

text: Dayı, varsın Hamza bana bir kez daha ihanet etsin
english: Uncle, let Hamza betray me once more

text: En azından hainin kim olduğu bellidir
english: At least we know who the traitor is.
He won't shoot us in the back like Big Head.

text: Yaralı bir adama it gibi saldırdığınıza göre gözünüzü çok korkutmuş olmalı
english: You must have been very intimidated to attack a wounded man like a dog.

text: Bundan böyle dilin lal bedenin mecalsiz kalacak
english: From now on, your tongue will leave your lal body empty.

text: Can borcumuz olan bu yiğitler de kimdir?
english: Who are these braves we owe our lives to?

text: Ben Kayı Boyu'ndan Süleyman Şah oğlu Ertuğrul
english: I am Ertuğrul, son of Solomon Shah of Kayı Boy
I'm Kirmani of the land of Kayseri.
What would that Noyan bastard want?
What would Selcan want in return?

text: Sungur Tekin Bey'imde olan bir emaneti ister
english: Sungur wants a piece of my business

text: onu alıp Cehennem Vadisi'ne gelmeni istedi
english: He asked you to pick him up and come to Hell Valley.

text: Yaralandığımda Ertuğrul onu Noyan'ın elinden aldı. Getirip bana verdi
english: When I got hurt, Ertugrul took it away from Noyan, brought it and gave it to me.
The seal was in the saddlebag.

text: Ben de geldim heybeyi yastığımın altına sakladım
english: So I came and hid the saddlebag under my pillow.

text: Beyin otağından kim girer de devlet sırrını çalar?
english: Who comes in from the brain pot and steals the secret of the state?

text: Dahası bu mührün sırrını kim bilir?
english: What's more, who knows the secret to this seal?

text: O vakit sana bir şey danışmak isteriz beyim
english: Then we'd like to consult with you, sir.

text: Bize bir mühür lazımdır. Yapabilir misin?
Sen İbn-i Arabi Hazretlerinin duasını almışsın evlat
english: You have received the blessing of His Majesty, Ibn Al-Arabi, my son.
All we have to say is amen.

text: Gideceğiniz diyarda Mahmut Derviş'imiz vardır. Yolunuz onunla kesişir
english: In the land where you're going, we have Mahmoud Dervis.

text: Ha, gideceğiniz yol uzundur Her daim tedarikli olun
english: Oh, it's a long way to go. Always be supplied.

text: Senden bir yardım daha isterim Hamza
english: I'll ask you for another favor, Hamza.

text: Gündoğdu'nun yalnız gelmeyeceğini çocuklar bile bilir
english: Even children know that the sun doesn't come alone.
What do you have in mind?

text: Yanına askerleri alasın ve cehennem vadisine gelesin
english: Take the soldiers with you and come to the valley of hell.
When the sun comes up, wait for my signal.
Kill anyone who's anywhere near him.

text: Ellerin dert görmesin beyim Eyvallah beyim
english: Don't trouble yourself, sir. Thank you, sir.
I want you to bring Selcan Hatun back safely.

text: Beyim, bu heybenin içine taş mı koydun ya?
english: Sir, did you put a rock in this saddlebag?
She's lost her mind in love.

text: Gayrı kuvveti de feri de gitti bizim oğlanın
english: The forces are gone and the ferri is gone.

text: Demek Kirmani Efendi'nin tedarikli olun dediği buymuş
english: So that's what Master Kirmani said about being supplied.

text: Ana, Goncagül, Gündoğdu Bey'imin hatunu olacak. Saygım sonsuz
english: Ana, Goncagül will be Mr. Gündü's girl.

text: Lakin gördüklerim ve duyduklarım susmama mani olur
english: But what I see and hear won't stop me from talking.
The night we dined together in the tent.

text: Goncagül ve Gökçe'yi Sungur Tekin Bey'imin otağına girerken gördüm
english: I saw Goncagül and Gökçe enter Sungur Tekin Bey's tent
Listen to me, everyone sneak up on me.

text: Benden emir gelene dek kimse hareket etmesin. Anlaşıldı mı?
english: No one moves until I give the order.
You'll see when he gets here.
You were a bird in the mistletoe.

text: şimdi beni tuzağa düşürdüğünü sanırsın ha?
english: Now you think you're setting me up, huh?

text: Avradın da senin gibi dişli çıktı
english: You've got the same gear as you.
He used to give me a hard time at my headquarters.
Be proud of him And be proud of yourself
But you're both going to die.
Under the feet of honor, Noyan

text: Öyle obadan hatun kaçırmakla olmayacağını sana belleteceğim
english: I'll let you know you're not going to miss out on a chick like that.

text: Tekme yemiş ihtiyar bir it gibi yalnızsın şimdi Noyan
english: You're alone now like an old dog who's been kicked, Noyan.

text: İntikamını almaya geldin ha ateşli oğlan? Öyle mi?
english: You're here for your revenge, huh, hot guy?

text: Tıpkı o günkü gibi. Sürülerini üzerime saldığın o günkü gibi
english: Just like that day, when you let your pack loose on me.

text: demek sana kemik uzatan eli ısırmaya azmettin ha?
english: So you're determined to bite the hand that gives you a bone, huh?
Come on, come on, come on, come on.

text: Gel ki beylerine de sıra gelsin
english: Come on, let your gentlemen get their turn.

text: Tabii benimle atları olmadan vuruşmaya cesaretleri varsa
english: Unless they dare to fight me without their horses.

text: Bu itin ölümü o kadar kolay olmayacak
english: This dog's death won't be so easy.

text: Demek mühür sahteydi ha akıllı oğlan?
english: So the seal was a fake, huh, smart guy?
If you don't kill me here

text: yanında yörende, obanda döşeğinde kim varsa derisini yüzerim
english: I'll skin whoever's next to you on your obanda bed.

text: Allahu ekber Allahu ekber. Allahu ekber

english: Why don't you finish him off now?

text: Bu itin nasıl öldüğünü herkes görecek
english: Everybody's gonna see how this dog dies.

text: Yorma kendini. Gündoğdu Bey'im seni obaya yetiştirecek merak, etme
english: Don't worry, Mr. Gündüz will take you to the office.

text: Peygamberimize hizmet eden o büyük adamın adını verdi anam bana
english: My mother gave me the name of the great man who served our Prophet.

text: Lakin ben buna bile layık olamadım beyim
english: But I didn't even deserve it, sir.
I'm so sorry. I'm so sorry.
You gave me the opportunity to be a martyr.

Glory be to Allah, the Most High, the Most High, the Most High, the Most High, the Most High, the Most High, the Most High, the Most High, the Most Great, the Most Great, the Most High, the Most Great, the Most Great, the Most Great, the Most Great, the Most Great, the Most Great, the Most Great.

text: eşhedü enne Muhammeden abdûhü ve resûlühu
english: ephedu enne Muhammaden abduhu and prophetuhu

text: Abdurrahman'a da Hamza'ya da güvenecek kadar ahmaktın
english: You were foolish enough to trust Abdurrahman and Hamza.

text: Artık Ögeday'ın kendine layık bir komutanı olacak
english: From now on, Itemday will have a worthy commander.
You won't be afraid because you're Oğuz's.

text: gün geçmiyor ki yeni bir ihanet ortaya çıkmasın
english: The day goes by so a new betrayal doesn't come out

text: zehirli bir ot gibi peydahlandılar obamızda
english: They're like a poisonous weed on our obama
If anyone knows what's going on
Let's get it off our feet, off our bows.

text: Hayme Ana, biz Süleyman Şah'ımızın yanında, sizlerin ellerinde büyüdük
english: Mother Hayme, we grew up with Solomon Shah in your hands.
We know you, we serve you
We don't know anything more than that.

text: Şeyhim İbn-i Arabi; Ertuğrul Bey ve size hizmet etmem için obanızda kalmamı istedi
english: My Sheikh, Ibn Al-Arabi, has asked me to stay in your office to serve you and Ertuğrul Bey.
What I hear, what I see, what you need to know
But we don't know any more than you do.
I know your tent, Hayme Ana.

text: Bir şey duyarsam size söylemek boynumun borcudur
english: If I hear anything, it's my duty to tell you.
Don't tell anyone what I'm talking about.
We have no reason to doubt them, Mother.

text: O halde kimden şüphelenmek gerek ki beyim?
english: Then who should I suspect, sir?

text: Bu ihaneti kim yapmış ola ki?
english: Who could have done this betrayal?

text: En küçük sırrımızı kim biliyorsa ondan
O haini bulana kadar tek tek herkesi sorgulayacağım
english: I'll question every single person until I find that traitor.
Not until we find the traitor inside of us.

text: ne de bize gün yüzü yoktur
Mührün sırrını Konya'dan başka kimse bilmez
english: No one knows the secret of the seal but Iconia
The news must have flown from Edo to Obaya.

text: Ahvale bakılırsa sarayla ilişkileri olan biri yapmıştır
english: Apparently, it was someone who had relations with the palace.

text: O halde sarayda da hainler cirit atar
english: Then there are traitors in the palace.
We're in the middle of a big game.

text: Buralar daha önce gördüğümüz hiçbir yere benzemez beyim
english: These places are unlike any place we've ever seen before, sir.
We're the ones in this land

text: bugüne kadar gördüğü hiçbir yere benzemeyiz kardeş
english: We're not like anything he's ever seen, brother.
We're right on the border line.
The hills in front of us are Byzantine.
Yes, sir. Yes, sir. Yes, sir.

text: Hey Yüce Allah'ım, bana bugünleri nasip ettin ya
english: Dear God, you've given me this day.
I don't care if I die.
I mean, he's the most honorable being.
So it's God's most precious creation.

text: Hiçbir ademoğlunun bir diğerine üstünlüğü yoktur
english: No ademoglu has the upper hand to another

text: Bu hakikati değiştirmeye hiç kimsenin gücü yetmez
english: No one can afford to change that truth

text: Neden gece gündüz size asillik taslayan efendilerinize kölelik edersiniz?
english: Why do you slave to your masters who have been noble to you day and night?
You let them steal your work, your right.
What do we do if we don't?
On this blessed land of God

text: Onlar efendi, biz ise değersiz köylüleriz
sizleri insanın insandan üstün olmadığı bir hakikate davet ederim
english: I invite you to a truth where man is not superior to man.
That no one is superior to anyone

text: Sabahtan beri çalışırız Aş yeriz, nefes alırız
english: We've been working all morning, eating soup, breathing.

text: Eğer birine rast gelirseniz derhal bildirin
english: If you run into anyone, let me know immediately.
Do you have something to say?

text: kilise ne zaman damarlarında kutsal kan akan efendilerimiz gibi
english: When the church is like our masters with holy blood flowing through their veins

text: bizim de karnımızın doymasına izin verecek komutan?
english: Will he let us eat too, Commander?

text: Daha ne kadar sürecek bu işkence?
english: How much longer is this torture going to take?

text: çoluğunla çocuğunla şu sefil hayatında nefes dahi almak istiyorsan
english: If you want to breathe in that miserable life with your children

text: bir daha asla bu sözleri dillendirme
english: Don't ever say those words again.
That man is not superior to man.
Tell me about this good faith, my lord.
I'll tell you, brother, I'll tell you.

text: Siz lokma hazırlayın Ben av yakalayıp geliyorum
english: You guys get a bite to eat. I'll catch up.
Yes, sir. Yes, sir. Yes, sir.

text: Hadi Doğan kardeş, sevdalı adamın yaptığı yemek leziz olurmuş der atalarımız
english: Come on, Brother Dogan, our ancestors say the food the loving man makes is delicious.

text: Ben at tımar edeceğim Sen de maharetini gösteresin
english: I'm going to groom the horse, and you're going to do the trick.

text: Hay dağların ayısı. Aşı gördün yanaş, işi gördün sıvış, değil mi?
english: You've had a vaccine, you've seen it, you've seen it, you've run away, haven't you?

text: Hadi kardeşler, ben de gideyim ateşi yakayım
english: Come on, brothers, I'll go light the fire.

text: Hayme Ana artık ne yaptığını bilmez olmuştur
english: Mother Hayme doesn't know what she's doing anymore.

text: Şahit olduklarım şerden başka bir şey değildir
english: What I witness is nothing but evil.
The Alps he raised with his own hands
He even questioned the dervish of Ibn Arabi
It's because of the trust that went missing in the shed.

text: En yakınından en uzağına kadar herkesten kuşkulanır oldu
english: He's been suspicious of everyone from the nearest to the nearest.
It must have been hard on Hayme.

text: Kendi otağına sahip çıkamamanın ayıbını etrafındakilere ödetir
english: He makes those around him suffer for not being able to keep his own tent.

text: Ben de en çok onu kaldıramam ya İnsanların gururlarıyla oynar
english: I can't handle him the most. He plays with people's pride.
He didn't call you a thief and question you.
He's going to question everyone who goes in or out.
He didn't know how to steal one of our tents.
Still no sign of Gündüz and Selcan.

text: Gün geçmiyor ki acıya acı öfkeye öfke eklenmesin
english: A day goes by where pain does not add anger to anger

text: Kimlerin bu işte parmağı var oğul?
english: Who's got something to do with this, son?

text: Bu işte Selçuklu Saray'ındaki fitnecilerin parmağı vardır ana
english: It's got something to do with the troublemakers at Seljuk Palace, Ana.

text: Öyleyse Noyan neden mühre sahip olmak için Selcan'ı kaçırdı oğul?
english: Then why did Noyan kidnap Selcan to get the seal, son?

text: İşin içinde belli ki başka hesaplar da var
english: Obviously, there are other accounts involved.

text: O hesaplar da tam da buradan senin otağından geçer ana
english: And those accounts go right through your tent, Ma.

text: Kimin benim otağımla hesabı olur ki?
english: Who's gonna settle up with my bed?

text: Bu ne menem bir beladır böyle?
english: What kind of trouble is this?
It's obviously someone's height in the room.
It's in the hands of our sultan's enemies.

text: Obada sarayla alakası olan tek kişi Gümüştekin
english: The only person in Obada who has anything to do with the palace is the one in Silver.
My son will marry his daughter.

text: Gümüştekin Bey için kem söz demem ana
english: I won't say a word to Mr. Silver.

text: Gümüştekin de, Aytolun da bu Noyan'ın itleri obaya saldırdığı zaman
english: The silver and the Aytol, when this Noyan's Mutts attacked the oba
Aytolin saved Selcan's life with me.
It's hard to even think about it, son.
Without cutting off the hand that reaches for your tent
To the soul of the deceased, El Fatiha

text: Noyan'a ininde kök söktürmüşsün Öyle der
english: You gave Noyan a hard time in his lair. That's what he says.
I'm sure he'll say it's true.

text: Ben Süleyman Şah'ın kızı Gündoğdu Bey'in avradıyım
english: I'm Suleyman Shah's daughter, Mr. Gündü.

text: Az bile ettim o soysuza beyim
english: I don't give a damn about that bastard, sir.
I pull out your eyes with my nails
I had to rip his liver out with my teeth.

text: O zaman seni de, Alplerini de bu belaya sokmamış olurdum
english: Then I wouldn't have gotten you and your Alps into this mess.
Everyone talks about it Selcan Hatun

text: Derler ki Alplerin, beylerin yapamadığını Selcan Hatun dişleriyle yapacakmış
english: They say that what the Alps, the gentlemen can't do, Selcan Hatun will do with his teeth.
He's gonna rip her liver out.

text: sen bu Noyan itinin istediği her ne haltsa
english: You're whatever this Noyan bastard wants.

text: sahtesini yapıp getirdin beni kurtardın ya
english: You made a fake one and saved me.

text: Gayrı ben bu dünyada daha ne isterim?
english: What more do I want in this world?

text: Allah senden bin kere razı olsun
english: God bless you a thousand times.

text: ben o gece gelip senin çadırında, döşeğinde yatacaktım
english: I was going to come and sleep in your tent that night, on your bed.
But it wasn't meant to be.
If we did, none of this would have happened to us.

text: O gece benim çadırıma gelseydin Noyan'ı yakalayamayacaktın beyim
english: If you'd come to my tent that night, you wouldn't have caught Noyan, sir.

text: Her şerde bir hayır vardır derler ya Al işte sana hayır
english: They say there's good in every bad thing. Here's a good thing.

text: İyi ki bu eziyeti çekmişim derim Sen tasa etmeyesin
english: It's a good thing I've suffered this torment. You don't have to worry about it.

text: O uğursuz gözlerinle belanı mı ararsın Noyan?
english: Looking for trouble with your evil eyes, Noyan?

text: Beni kızdırıp işini burada bitirmemi mi istersin?
english: You want me to piss you off and finish you off here?

text: Seni bir böcek gibi ezip çukura attığım için
english: For crushing you like a bug and throwing you in the pit.

text: Gündoğdu beni burada hemencecik öldürmedi diye delirirsin
english: You'd go crazy because the sun didn't just kill me here.
Your carcass will rot in the middle of the oboe.
The pieces of meat that cling to the raven's beaks
I'll listen to the little maggots gnaw.

text: Aç itler kemiklerini parçalamak için birbirlerini yiyecek
english: Hungry Mutts will eat each other to break their bones.
And I, when your bones are broken
I'll listen to the bones Noyan

text: Ah ateşli oğlan ah. Dur bakalım
english: Oh, hot boy, oh, wait a minute.

text: senin gibi öküz güden bir çobanın anlayacağı işler değil bunlar
english: That's not what a shepherd like you understands.

text: Kendin kadar ateşli avradın Gökçe'yle oynaşmaya benzemez bu işler
english: You're as hot as you are. It's not like making out with Gökçe.
Smart boy's gonna take me to the oba.
Your honor, your honor, your obans

text: Yakında babanın otağını da senden alacaklar
english: Soon they'll take your father's tent away from you.

text: Sen sadece ateşli avradının oyuncağı olacaksın
english: You're just gonna be your hot wife's toy.

text: Alpler, alın bunu buradan Atımın terkisine bağlayın
english: Alps, take this from here and tie it to the abandonment of my horse.
We're gonna hit the road real quick.
Your foot's all healed up, brother.

text: Artuk Bey'in verdiği ilaçlar iyi geldi
english: The medicine that Mr. Artuk gave me was good.

text: Deyin hele hangi deli fırtına sürükledi sizi buraya?
english: Say, what crazy storm drove you here?

text: Mühür yüzünden otağa giren çıkan kim varsa sorguya yatırmış
english: He questioned anyone who got in or out because of the seal.

text: Dahası Korkut da kardeşine hak verir
english: What's more, Scare him and he'll agree with his brother.

text: Bu mühür başımıza dert olacak demiştim baba
english: I told you this seal would be a problem for us, Dad.
If it turns out we have it
What's more, we'll be accused of stealing.

text: Senin uç beyliği de hayal olur ağabey
english: Your flying master is a dream too, brother.

text: Gayrı Korkut'un kara toprağa girme vakti gelmiştir Aytolun
english: It's time for Farther Scare to enter the black earth, Aytolun.
But he must not die until he has married his son.
I'm going to leave him out of trouble.

text: Düğünden önce ölürse uç beyliği işi uzar Aytolun
english: If he dies before the wedding, the master of flight will be long gone, Aytolun.
His son's gonna die making out on the wedding day.

text: biz de beyliğimiz için gerekeni yapalım
english: Let's do what we have to do for our master's sake.

text: Bu mühür hepimizin başına dert olacak
english: This seal will be a problem for all of us.

text: İstediğimi almadan o mührü Saadettin Köpek'e vermeyeceğim
english: I won't give that seal to Dog until I get what I want.
It's the end of the line.
We have nothing to lose but ourselves.
Will Mr. Gündüz return to the oba?

text: Bir alp, kardeşinin; bir bey, yiğitlerinin
english: An alpine, your brother's, a gentleman, a hero's.

text: bir er de avradının hesabını sormadan obaya döner mi Turalı?
english: Will a private return to the room without asking for his account, Turalı?

text: Alpliğin ve yiğitliğin ilk şartıdır sünnet
english: Circumcision is the first condition of the Alps and valor

text: Bu hançer de bana atamdan yadigârdır
english: This dagger is also a relic of my ancestor.
Other than that, it'll be yours.

text: Senin ya. Lakin önce yiğitliğini göstermen gerek
english: But first you must show your courage.
Let the gentlemen return to the oba.
That's the first thing you'll wear.

text: Sonra da bu hançer senin olacak
english: Then this dagger will be yours.

text: Bu hançerle cenge gidilmez Artuk Bey
english: You can't go to war with this dagger, Mr. Artuk.
I'd like a lapet for a circumcision.

text: Sen hele Alp ol, ben sana kendi pusatımı veririm
english: Why don't you be the Alps, and I'll give you mine?

text: Nice zamandır obamızın içindeki hainlerin kötü emelleri…
english: For many years, the evil intentions of the traitors within our Oba...
Before the recordings hit our oba...
...our club would be shown with fingers in the Turkishmen's size.

text: Kayılar lanetli bir musibet gibi gelip…
english: The apricots come like a cursed plague...
The apricots are one of the bravest men in Oğuz

text: Ertuğrul’un yiğitliği Türkmenlerde dilden dile anlatılır
english: The gallantry of Ertuğrul (Turkishmen) is spoken in tongues.

text: Kayılarla Dodurgalılar arasında ayrımız gayrımız yoktur
english: There's no difference between apricots and Dodurga.

text: Sen her şeyin doğrusunu daha iyi bilirsin beyim
english: You know better than anything, sir.

text: Lakin benim söylediklerimi de yabana atmayasın
english: But don't take my word for it.
Are you feeling better now, sir?

text: Yahu kardeş, buraya geldik geleli hiç kefere göremedik
english: Brother, since we've been here, we haven't seen a thing.

text: Yanlış yere mi geldik, ne ettik?
english: Have we come to the wrong place or what?
We've come to bed, brother. They're everywhere.
You'll get your share soon. Don't worry.
Allah is the One Who was not born, nor did He give birth.

text: Yani Allah’ın hiç çocuğu olmamış mıdır?
english: I mean, didn't Allah ever have a child?
...would he be any different from us people?

text: O, Allah’ın peygamberidir Ve maalesef kardeşim…
english: He is the prophet of God, and unfortunately, my brother...
...to take him out of the prophecy...

text: …Allah’ın oğlu yaptığında çok büyük bir küfür işlenir
english: ...when God makes a son, there is a great blasphemy.

text: O kadar çok günahım var ki

english: Do not forget that God is All-merciful.

text: Şimdi o yüce Allah’ın gelsin de…
english: Now, may your great God come.
Come on, God, it's the truth.
Hey, I'm a victim of the Creator.
Fate has come to us, brothers.
The voice of my lord is the voice of Kefere

text: Görür müsün Goncagül, obamız nelerle sınanır
english: Do you see, Goncagül, what our oba is tested with?

text: Bu hainlerin obamıza yaptıkları yetmezmiş gibi…
english: As if what these traitors did to our oba wasn't enough...
...now they've set eyes on our tent.

text: Bu ihanetler beni şüpheden şüpheye itmiştir
english: These betrayals have led me to doubt.
You're the woman of the dawn...
Until this mess is cleaned up...
And you have to do your part.
But I'm the daughter of this tent
The death that is about to come to this pasture...
I'm sure it's for me, too.

text: Lakin ne bir gördüğüm ne bir işittiğim vardır
english: But I don't see, I don't hear, I don't hear.
If there was, I'd let you know right away.
I'd like you to push your mind.

text: Belki aklına gelmeyen önemli bir şey vardır, ha?
english: Maybe there's something important you haven't thought of, huh?
I've been thinking a lot, Hayme Ana.

text: Ne bir gördüğüm ne bir işittiğim oldu
english: I didn't see or hear anything.

text: Artık düşmanlarını kendi çocuklarının arasından mı ararsın?
english: You're calling your enemies from amongst your own children now?

text: Senin gibi Selçuklu Sarayı'nda bulunmuş biri…
english: Someone like you who's been to Seljuk Palace...

text: …gerekenin yapılmasına niye bu kadar telaş eder?
english: Why would he be so anxious to have it done?
What makes you angry, Mr. Silver?
For this stain to be cleaned...
Hayme Ana Korkuk Bey is sick.
Until I saw my son's blessing...
Don't let me die, Mr. Artuk.
It's time for us to go to Iconium with you.
The constant relapse that runs through your veins...
I'd like to consult more physicians than myself.

text: Konya’ya gitme işini de nereden çıkardın Artuk Bey?
english: What makes you think you're going to Iconium, Mr. Artuk?

text: Beyim, seni perişan eden bu illetin ne olduğunu bilmek şarttır
english: Sir, it's imperative to know what this disease is that makes you miserable.
How many physicians do I know in Iconium?
Each is better than the other.
Let's just get this wedding over with.

text: …ne istersen yapacağım Kendimi sana teslim edeceğim
english: I'll do whatever you want. I'll give myself to you.
Will you still sip it, sir?
You told Aytolun Hatun not to use it.

text: İyileşene kadar beyim bu ilacı kullansın
english: Let my master take this medicine until he recovers.

text: Kanında ne zehir varsa söküp atmaya yardım edecektir
english: It'll help to remove whatever poison's in your blood.

text: Korkut Bey’imin hâlini hiç iyi görmem Hayme Hatun
english: I don't see my Mr. Scare very well Hayme Hatun

text: Sanki vücudunda atamadığı bir zehir vardır
english: It's like there's a poison in his body that he can't get rid of.

text: O zehir ki hem dilinin rengine hem göz pınarlarına sirayet etmiştir
english: Which covers the colour of your tongue and the fountains of your eyes.

text: Ben böyle bir şey ilk defa görüyorum
english: I've never seen anything like it.
So, what kind of poison is this?
I don't know if it's what you're eating or what you're drinking.
The only way to know is to...
I'll take him and take him to Iconia.
But he wouldn't go for it.
Why don't you listen to Mr. Artuk?

text: Senin iyi niyetini, kalbinin temizliğini bilmez miyim?
english: Don't I know your good intentions, your heart's purity?
...is the last thing I want from you.
You broke anyone's heart with your doubts...
If we don't unite against the Mongolians...
I hear you're looking for the people who stole the trust.
I hope you catch him sooner or later.

text: Emin ol ki çok uzun sürmeyecek Aytolun
english: I assure you, Aytolun, it won't take long.
Give it to us, we'll kill the traitor!

text: Şehitlerimizin kanı yerde kalmasın. Gebertin şunu!
english: Don't let the blood of our martyrs fall to the ground.
Kill the murderer of our children
Let the Noyan pay the penalty!
Give it to us, we'll give it to you
Let's kill him with our own hands
Don't let the blood of our children fall on the ground.
Keep our children's blood on the ground!
Let's kill him with our own hands!
The brave women of our Oba!
As long as there's a chahan...
...to be on the side of justice in the face of cruelty...

text: …hakkı savunmak biz Oğuz evlatlarının kutlu vazifesidir
english: ...is the sacred duty of the sons of Oğuz to defend the right.
How many times has it been to our religion, to our heritage, to our land
The mongoloid shroud that coveted it.
We're not going to give it away!
Today is the day of our victory
Those who lay their hands on our banner...
This is the day of victory we broke his hand.

text: Nice vakittir bu topraklarda mazluma göz açtırmayan…
english: It's been a long time since I've been in this land...
...the day the Mongol dog Noyan got down on his knees.

text: Sanmayın ki bu zafer benim zaferimdir
english: Don't think this victory is my victory
This victory is a victory for all of us
This victory is the harbinger of the dawn we've been waiting for
The promise of God is near.
It is our duty to defend this promise.

text: Bu kavga hak ile batılın kavgasıdır
english: This is a fight between right and wrong.

text: Şimdi burada, hepinizin gözleri önünde haykırıyorum
english: Now I'm here, screaming in front of all of you.
We'll be martyrs for this victory.
You won't even have graves in this land.

text: Cihan imparatorluğunun önünde yok olup gideceksiniz
english: You'll be destroyed in front of the Jahan empire.
We're gonna go down to the cots of your wives.
We will water the land with the blood of your horses

text: Bu kefereye cevabı inşallah yarın vereceğiz

english: Take him to the caged tent
He should be back by now.
He said go back to the cave.

text: Hamza’yı komutan belleyip askerlerin başına koymuş
english: Hamza put the commander in charge of the soldiers
...the last word hasn't been said yet.

text: Boş lakırdıları ne kadar çok seversin Noyan
english: How much you love idle chitchat Noyan

text: Kuş gibi şu çadırda çırpınırken bile…
english: Even when you're struggling like a bird in that tent...

text: …nasıl bu kadar kelam edersin aklım almaz
english: I don't know how you can say so much.

text: Beni bir an evvel öldürsen iyi edersin

english: Let's do it while you can.

text: Yoksa ailenden bir tek kişiyi bile sağ koymayacağım
english: Or I won't let a single member of your family live.
I'll bring down the Oban on your head

text: Sen hayal kurmaya devam et Noyan
Ben yarın cehenneme bir Moğol iti daha göndereceğim
english: I'll send another Mongol mutt to hell tomorrow.
Tangut! Noyan fell into the hands of Gündüz.
This is no time to be beaten, Great Sage.

text: Ordumuz bu haberle dağılmadan öncülük etmek lazım gelir
english: We need to lead our army before they fall apart with this news.
You shouldn't put soldiers without heads.
Where is the leader to replace Noyan?
Are you going to lead the troops?

text: Senin de üzerine düşeni yapman lazım gelir
english: You'll have to do your part. He'll come.
I want you to back me up.

text: Yiğit Moğol nökerleri Noyan, Türklerin eline düşmüştür
english: Heroic Mongolians Noyan fell into the hands of the Turks

text: Lakin bu sizde yılgınlığa neden olmasın
english: But don't let it get to you.

text: Damarlarınızda Cengiz Han’ın savaşçı kanı akar
english: You have Genghis Khan's warrior blood flowing through your veins
Give this blood what it deserves.
I'm your leader from now on.
The Noyan fall into the hands of the Turks...
Don't let it ruin our promise to Ogeday.
We shed the blood of the Turks without a Noyan
Save me so we can see your command

text: Bu nökerler Ögeday’ın gayesine hizmet ederler
english: They serve the purpose of the item.

text: Yüce yaratıcı oğlun İsa’ya verdiğin kudreti bana da ver
english: Give me the power you have given your great creative son, Jesus.
Feed me the soul of your son

text: Kostas sizi görmek ister Komutan Valentine
english: Kostas would like to see you, Commander Valentine.
The important news you have for me?
They killed your soldiers, Master Valentine.
What are you talking about, fool?

text: Kim benim askerlerimin canına kast etme cesaretini gösterir?
english: Who dares to take the life of my soldiers?

text: Halkı zehirlerken, haddini bildirmek için askerleriniz geldi
english: While poisoning the people, your soldiers came to kick his ass.
I don't know where the hell it came from, but...

text: …birkaç Türk savaşçı geldi ve tüm askerlerinizi öldürdü
english: ...a few Turkish warriors came and killed all your soldiers.
Now listen to what I have to say.

text: Bak, sana Kayı’nın yiğit Alplerini getirdim
english: Look, I've brought you the mighty Alps of Kaiy.

text: Ali, beyim Babam bana Edebali der
english: Ali, sir My father calls me Edebali
Divanü Lügati't-Turk. He is the bird of prey.

text: Seninle birleşince yiğit er anlamına gelmiştir
english: When you're joined together, it means a brave soldier.

text: Ali kardeş, Ali kardeş Benimkini de de hele
english: Brother Ali, brother Ali and mine too

text: Her suale cevap verilmez Bamsı Alp
english: You don't answer every question, Bamsik Alp.
If you'll be our guest tonight...
Of course they'll be our guests, son.

text: Bu yiğitleri bulmuşuz öyle kolay kolay bırakır mıyız?
english: We've found these braves, and we're just gonna let them go?
We're the only two left in the mortal world.
I sent my heart to Damascus...
...wants to get him educated in the madrassa, but...
I hope you get what you want, Mahmoud.

text: Ee, sizi hangi rüzgâr attı buraya?
Hayvanlarımızı otlatacağımız yeni bir yurt ararız
english: We'll look for a new home where we can feed our animals.
Then you've found the right place.
This land fattens both your animals...

text: Ahir ömrümde bu diyarın toprağı kadar bereketlisini görmedim
english: I've never seen a land as fertile as this land in my life.

text: Sen ne vakit geldin buralara? Niye geldin?
Beyim, biz viran gönülleri tamir etmek için geldik
english: Sir, we're here to fix the broken hearts.

text: Hoca Ahmet Yesevi’nin Horasan’da yaktığı ateşi…
english: The fire that Master Ahmet Yesevi had set in Horasan.
We wanted to move it here.

text: Hoca Ahmet Yesevi için can kurbandır
english: Teacher Ahmet Yesevi is the victim of death

text: Buranın garip halkıyla nasıl muhabbet kurarsın?
english: How do you communicate with the strange people here?
The trick is to know your heart's language

text: Lakin buranın halkının gönlü kırıktır, yaralıdır
english: But the hearts of the people here are broken, wounded

text: Sen ve senin gibi dervişler sayesinde…
english: Thanks to you and dervish like you...
And thanks to brave men like you...
I hope there will be no opportunity for the cruelty of my oppressor.

text: Selcan kızım o soysuzların karşısında dimdik durup…
english: Selcan, my daughter is standing up to those degenerates...

text: …Kayı kadınının ne kadar yiğit olduğunu gösterdi abi
english: ...showed how brave the Kay woman was, brother.

text: Kızım, seninle gurur duyduğumu bilmeni isterim
english: Girl, I want you to know I'm proud of you.

text: Tabii kızımın obaya dönmesi belanın bittiği anlamına gelmez
english: Of course, just because my daughter's back in the room doesn't mean the trouble's over.
As there was a time of betrayal...

text: Sungur Tekin’in emanetini çalan her kimse…

english: ...he won't find peace until he's out in the open.
I don't know what the stolen relic is.
...if we knew why he was so valued...

text: …belki bizim de bir yardımımız dokunurdu Sungur Tekin Bey’im
english: Perhaps we could be of some help to you, Mr. Sungur Tekin.
The privates of your tent have been chewed, Mr. Güverkin.
There's something you should think about.
...who knows which demon's toy he's become.

text: …hangi iblisin oyuncağı olacağını bilemeyecek kadar da ahmaktır
english: He's too stupid to know which demon's toy he'll be.
How many battles have you won in the field...

text: …otağda kaybetmenin ne demek olduğu şimdi anlaşıldı
english: ...now it's clear what it's like to lose in a room.

text: O vakit, iki otağın da kulağına ve diline sahip olması gerektiğini…
english: Well, then, I'll tell you what, both of them have to have their ears and their tongue.
You've seen it, haven't you, Tugtekin?

text: Bu yaşımda bana zaferi tattırdınız ya evlatlarım…
english: You've given me victory at my age, my sons.
May he be pleased with you, uncle.
What is the way of Byzantine?

text: Ahaliye zulmetmekten başka vazifeleri yoktur beyim
english: They have no duty but to persecute the people, my lord.

text: Vergi deyip, yoksul halkın elinde ne var ne yok alırlar
english: They call it taxes and take what the poor people have.
Those who don't have the power to pay will be persecuted

text: Bizans tekfurları da halkı rahat bırakmaz
english: Byzantine tekfurs don't leave the people alone.
It's tax, so when you say cult fighting...

text: Köylülerle soylular arasında çok büyük bir adaletsizlik var
english: There is a great injustice between the villagers and the nobles.
...we'd like to hear from the people of the village.
Here you go. You're welcome over my head.
My door is always open to you.

text: Eğer gelirseniz, yarın sizi diğer dostlar da dinlemek ister
english: If you come tomorrow, the other friends will want to hear from you.
I can't see the two of you...
How can a man be evil, son?
Why don't you come over here and sit on my side?

text: Er ya da geç ayrılık vakti gelecek
english: Sooner or later, it's time to leave.

text: Obanın beyliği de bilirim ki senin olacak oğul
english: I also know that Oban's lordship will be yours, son.
From the top of the silver
Dad, this is not the time to talk about this.
Be near the dawn and Ertugrul
That doesn't make you small, son.
On the contrary, it makes it bigger.

text: İhanetin her yanımızda dallanıp budaklandığını hiç aklından çıkarmayasın
english: Don't forget that betrayal is branching out all around us.

text: Kayı otağındaki kardeşlerinizle bir olun, diri olun
english: Be together with your brothers in the field, and be alive.

text: İhanetin bizleri çökertmesine asla müsaade etmeyin
english: Never let betrayal bring us down

text: Akıllı oğlan dönek kardeşini de almış gelmiş
english: Good boy. He's here with his backstabbing brother.

text: Atam Oğuz’un yolundan bir kez bile dönmedim
english: I never once turned back from the path of my father, Oğuz.
I've made you the man of the item.
I laid the device at your feet.
My friendship and the friendship of Item
How did you know I was on the caravansaray?

text: Tek hain, tek dönek sen değilsin Sungur Tekin
english: You're not the only traitor, you're not the only quitter Sungur Tekin
Why don't you go get some rahvan, brother?
It's not worth getting your hands dirty.

text: Sen bu haberleri aldığına göre Noyan…
english: Now that you've heard the news, Noyan...

text: …bu kişi belli ki Sultan Alaeddin’in sarayından biri
english: This person is clearly one of Sultan Alaeddin's palaces.

text: Hatta belki de ona çok yakın biri
english: Maybe even someone very close to him.

text: Sana boşuna akıllı oğlan demedim Gündoğdu
english: I didn't call you a smart boy for nothing.
But your mind was just a little bit more...
...we'd tear down that palace together with Alaeddin.
Instead of doing something like this...
...to die with my son's blind knife.

text: Yedi ceddin, o kör bıçakla gebermediğin için sana beddua edecek
english: Seven ceddins will curse you for not dying with that blind knife.

text: Sana mührü de benim gittiğim yeri de öteni…
english: Tell you about the seal and where I'm going.
...we'll find it sooner or later, Noyan.
The one who lives in your tent...
...anyone who passes through the shadow of your house...
...a bunch of kids, a lot of girls...

text: Kayıların yaşamadığı o utancı yaşatacağım sizlere
english: I'll make you suffer the shame that the apricots don't.

text: Tatlı tatlı akan kanında boğulup gitmeyeceksin sen
english: You won't drown in your sweet, sweet blood

text: Canını yaktığın o ahali var ya…
…şu kılıcımla kelleni almam için bana yalvaracaksın
english: ...you'll beg me to take your head with my sword.

text: Cehennem senin sığınağın olacak Noyan, cehennem
english: Hell will be your refuge Noyan, hell

text: Yarın cihan kaç bucakmış göreceksin akıllı oğlan
O kör bıçakla beni gebertmediğin her güne lanet edeceksin
english: You'll curse every day you don't kill me with that blind knife.

text: Duydun mu beni, ha? Duydun mu beni?
Otağımızda hep birlikte yemek yemeyeli epey bir vakit olmuştu Halime
english: It's been a while since we've all had dinner together in our tent, Halima.
I haven't felt this peaceful in a long time.

text: Otağımızın üstündeki kara bulutlar yavaş yavaş dağılıyor Selcan
english: The dark clouds above our tent gradually fall apart, Selcan.

text: Sen kendini boşuna harap etmişsin kardeşim
english: You've ruined yourself for nothing, brother.

text: Bak, Gündoğdu Bey canını ortaya koydu…
english: Look, Mr. Gündüz put his life on the line...
...he saved you from the Mongolian Mutt.

text: Gündoğdu hayatını tehlikeye atıp beni kurtarmaya geldi ya…
english: You know when the sun came up and risked your life to save me?
It's my duty not to upset him beyond that.

text: Vay, vay, vay! Sofraya bak hele
En sevdiğin yemekleri hazırladık Halime Sultan’la birlikte
english: We've prepared your favorite food, Halima Sultan.
Did you get anything out of Noyan?
Tomorrow we'll take your life, Mother.
In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.

text: Cihana küsmüş gibi daha ne kadar oturacaksın orada?
english: How long are you going to sit there like you're upset?

text: Aral Gölü gibi buz tutmuştu aşkları
english: Their love is frozen like Aral Lake
I still feel like an idiot.

text: Karşımda öyle birbirlerine bakıp gülümsemelerini gördükçe
english: As I look at each other and see them smile
He'll think of nothing but you.

text: Buz çölü gibi kavruk o uğursuz karının döşeğinden hayır gelseydi
english: If the frozen desert had come from the bed of that ill-fated wife of yours
When you give him your youth, your beauty
You'll have dust on your feet.

text: Git ve onlara kim olduğunu göster
english: Go and show them who you are
Not to be called to you.
You need a little bit of courage.
And the tree is a big thing.

text: İndirin beni buradan, indirin beni buradan
english: Get me out of here, get me out of here.
But you know what? How to cry.
The migrant cranes have changed their path in fear
Next thing I know, my brother's coming from a distance.

text: Oy kurbanın olayım kardeşim indir beni buradan dedim
english: I said, let me be your victim, brother. Get me out of here.

text: Bugün indirdim, yarın ne edeceksin? Nasıl çıktıysan öyle ineceksin
english: I downloaded it today, what are you going to do tomorrow?
That's how stubborn he is, brother.

text: Lakin sen de böylece çıktığın ağaçtan inmeyi öğrendin
english: But that's how you learned to get out of the tree.
My Hayme Mother says it's true

text: Ağabeyim sayesinde çıktığım ağaçtan nasıl ineceğimi de öğrendim
english: Thanks to my brother, I learned how to get out of the tree.

text: E iki parmağım kırıldı ama olsun
english: I broke two fingers, but that's okay.
I've come to share the joy at your table.

text: Zor bir gündü. Müsaaden olursa gidip dinlenmek isterim
english: It's been a rough day, so if you'll excuse me, I'd like to go and rest.
Sure, girl, go get some rest.
Selcan, take my daughter to her tent.

text: Kazanın dibinde biraz bulgur aşı kaldı
english: At the bottom of the accident, there's some bulch vaccine left.
Your breath, your scent, it's all around you.
When I fall into your hands
I wasn't scared for a moment.

text: Bildim ki sen geleceksin beni kurtaracaksın
english: ♪ I knew you'd come ♪ ♪ You'll save me ♪
What more can I ask of my Lord?

text: bundan sonra hep senin yanında olacağım
english: From now on, I'll always be there for you.
Why don't you stay with me tonight?

text: Sana tek bir şey soracağım Noyan
english: Let me ask you one thing, Noyan.

text: Sungur Tekin'de olup da ele geçirmek istediğiniz şey
english: That's what you want to get from Sungur Tekin.

text: Niye onu bu kadar çok istersin?
english: Why do you want him so badly?
Who do you ask that for, huh?
You did it on behalf of the dog?
You've done well. I know the dog well.
# For the love of flying master #
There's no limit to what you can do.
That you set the dog on his feet

text: bunun için yeri geldiğinde benden daha acımasız olabileceğini
english: When the time comes, you can be more cruel than me.

text: Ağzından çıkanı kulağın işitir mi senin aşağılık herif?
english: Will you listen to yourself, you son of a bitch?

text: Sen beni ne sanırsın ha Gümüştekin?
english: Who do you think I am in silver?

text: yarın infaz edileceğim diye beni hor mu görürsün?
english: Do you despise me for being executed tomorrow?

text: Kaldı ki beni öldürmeye gücünüz yetmeyecek
english: Besides, you won't be able to kill me.

text: O vakit sen de gerçeği göreceksin
Daha başlamadan savaşı çoktan kaybettiğiniz gerçeğini
english: The fact that you've already lost the war before it even began
Those who are subject to the Mongols
The truth of how he grew and grew stronger

text: Sana istediklerini ancak ben veririm Gümüştekin
english: I'm the only one who can give you what you want

text: Gördüğün gibi ben her şeyi bilirim
english: As you can see, I know everything.

text: beni bu boş sözlerle kandırabileceğini mi sanırsın?
english: You think you can fool me with those empty words?

text: Gündoğdu'yu o kaltağın döşeğine gönderdi hala
english: He's still sending Sundown to that bitch's bed.
What do you think, my Gonca?
He took her to his tent with him.
In the cold, in the cold
I waited for Selcan to come out of his tent.
She'll be looking for comfort in that bitch's arms.
I'm still going to kill Selcan.

text: bu hayat bana züldür hala, bilesin
english: This life is crazy to me, just so you know.
I got caught up in it for a while.
In my dream it's you again
You're holding a tight child in your hand.
He's got blue eyes like you.
